pageContext.description: Four fragments., 21 lower part, 22 upper " four ribs, 23 small celt, 25 upper part crushed (not-drawn, 21 + 22 Transfered to separate cards.
pageContext.other: In a different hand: "OK (section)‚Äù  "ND 1974"  C1,  NUMBERS DON'T ADD UP: 21, 22, 23, 25 = 4.  Transferred out: 21 + 22 = 2 now.  But lengths and widths given for 3 items; weights are for 4 items.
pageContext.site: England, Greater London, Bexley Heath, Founder's hoard, Discovered in 1930 in a sandpit, belonging to Wm. Buxley at a depth, of 15-20 ft. from the surface.
pageContext.remarks: 21 Socketed Celts, 16 Fragments ", 1 Chisel?, 1 Gouge, 1 Knife, 1 Spearhead, 1 Sword, 1 Copper cake Fragments"
